entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: update ICustomQueryInterface signature to take the guid by in, not ref #91858
  • Local GC, GCHeap::Alloc never called #91857
  • Crash when trying to load an Assembly in a hostfxr environment after calling FreeConsole() #91856
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #91855
  • XmlConvert.EncodeLocalName does not encode reserved names #91853

Closed

  • Updating to .NET 8 Preview 7 from .NET 7 Different behavior on Configuration Binding #91823
    8.0.0
  • Cross-target test runs require too many dependencies #11747
    Future
  • [Linux, amd64] ICorDebugEval::Abort are broken. #82422
    9.0.0
  • aspnetcore 8 preview 4 blazor wasm size regression #86601
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' #91505
    8.0.0
  • Do not edit the file if the function is centered #91837

PullRequests

Created

  • Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ensure AVX512 ternary operands aren't used twice #91851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 116.0.5845.179, windows: 116.0.5845.180 #91849
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix fgDebugCheckFlags checks for FTN_ADDR #91766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Dont' use bareword `bool` in icall sig macros #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use `Unsafe.WriteUnaligned` in `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • The IConfiguration.GetSection method will not return null, call the IConfigurationSection.Exists extension method to determine. #91832
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Cleanup defines for specialized handle types #91847
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't link in debugger component in release mode. #91848
    area-Build-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
